title: Quarto Dashboards (Static)
text:
Here is my first Quarto dashboard. It was created using the Wellcome 2018 data. It contains two pages, each featuring value cards and graphs about the data.




The github with the source code can be found here.

title: About
text: This is my first website. It’s posts contain my projects from my learning experience of STAT 541.

title: Advanced Visualizations
text:
Here are some advanced visualizations created using the Wellcome 2018 data.
This is a faceted dotplot of belief in vaccine effectiveness, faceted by global region.









Another visualization created used leaflet to create a chloropleth. It focuses on the distribution in trust in science throughtout the world.






Finally, I used plotly to create a nice labelled scatterplot to demonstrate the relationship between the belief vaccines are effective, and trust in science.






The github with the source code can be found here.

title: Quarto Dashboards (Dynamic)
text:
Here is my first dynamic quarto It was created using Wellcome 2018 data. Just like the static dashboard, it features two pages, each with a variety of graphs and value cards. Now, you have the ability to change the first-page value cards for comparison-sake, and change the number of grouping colors on the chloropleth.




The github with the source code can be found here.
